import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Endereco } from '../endereco'; @Component({ selector: 'app-endereco-list', templateUrl: './endereco-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./endereco-list.component.css'] }) export class EnderecoListComponent implements OnInit { enderecos: Endereco[] = []; constructor() { } ngOnInit(): void { } }
